name: Starsong
description:
4 robots, separated and isolated from one another seek to reconnect through music. Connect all nodes in ascending or descending order to build your own song.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows: Movement

R: reset nodes

E: Interact

Game made by:

Lone Cactus Games (Programmer/Designer/Caffeine to Code Converter)

A_Glitchy_Wendigo (Artist/Professional Sleep Denier)

Rusidion (Composer/Beethoven but Better)

BlueFlareBlitz (Concept artist/comic relief)

Extra Asset:

"Mild Wind Background Noise" - Bashar3A (https://opengameart.org/content/mild-wind-background-noise)
